item.title: Issues of elderly citizens to be included in reforms agenda Says Wahiduddin Mahmud
item.description: Different issues related to the wellbeing of the elderly citizens would be added to the reforms agenda, Planning Adviser Wahiduddin Mahmud disclosed on Sunday. "If policies are required (for the wellbeing of the senior citizens), some of them can be prepared within a short period," said Mr Mahmud.
